active_skill.name: Decoy Paper Armor
active_skill.description:
Uses a cardboard box to camouflage itself, inducing a taunt effect: While camouflaged, being attacked by enemies or reaching the camouflage time limit will trigger an explosion, dealing Physical DMG in an area.

DMG Multiplier: 877%

Daze Multiplier: 513%

Cooldown 20s

additional_ability.name: Cardboard Armor
additional_ability.description: When there is at least 1 Defense character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack generates Shield for all squad members. The more enemies hit, the more Shield generated, up to a max of 14%/16.8%/21% of Paperboo's Max HP. Shield Duration 24s

chain_attack.name: Paper Armor: Impact Mode
chain_attack.description:
Enters a cardboard box and jumps at the target enemy, causing an explosion when it lands, dealing Physical DMG over a large area.

DMG Multiplier: 1263%

Daze Multiplier: 180%
